channel.title: Demo Access to iCloud Samples
channel.description:
Recently, I went back to a demo user with all the limited sounds; but I’m not here to complain about that.
An issue I have as a demo user is with iCloud Samples. Usually this option is for Auxy Subscribers, but I was able to access this option and choose whatever samples I want. However, once I chose my sample (and left the edit loop section), I am instantly locked out of that Drum Kit. And instantly, I wasted an instrument and can not delete it.

item.title: Demo Access to iCloud Samples
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Seems like a glitch. I can import sounds, and audition them, but when I try to assign it to a drum slot the it doesn’t work. The sample is grayed out too. Maybe reboot device? Failing that I’d email feedback@auxy.co and file bug report.

Read full topic
